alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern South Belt / Ellington, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, northeastern Pearland, northern League City, northern Friendswood, Deer Park, South Houston, Galena Park, Webster, Greater Hobby Area, South Belt / Ellington, Clear Lake, Nassau Bay, Brookside Village, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Edgebrook Area, The Johnson Space Center, Park Place, Meadowbrook / Allendale, Ellington Field and Hobby Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
